title: [Patreon Preview] Get Jim to Comic Con!
itunes:title: [Patreon Preview] Get Jim to Comic Con!
description:
We're back with another After Show for you! This week, the gang makes Jim an official ordained minister in order to officiate his friend's wedding! They also try to campaign to get Jim to Comic Con and then guess every state's most famous dish.

Subscribe to our Patreon at patreon.com/IDKAT for ad free episodes, bonus episodes, and more exclusive perks! Tiers start at just $2!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
